text: hi guys it's Angela today I'm really
excited because I'm going to show you
guys how to make a three ingredient red
bean ice cream and a red bean ice cream
parfait and since I know a lot of you
guys don't have ice cream makers at home
so this is going to be a no turn no ice
cream maker required recipe now this is
also a very special video because this
is part of a Valentine's Day pink and
Pocky video collaboration with Rachel
from kawaii sweet world where she makes
the most amazing and cute desserts on
her baking channel it was so awesome to
visit her studio in person and watch her
make a pink Pocky cake so don't forget
to check out her video afterwards now I
cannot wait to have a red bean ice cream
parfait so let's go ahead jump right in
and get started for the ice cream
ingredients I'm using one can of chilled
and super cold full fat coconut milk or
you can also use coconut cream just make
sure that the percentage fat content is
at least 25% because this will allow us
to make a creamy no churn whipped ice
cream next I'm using 1/3 cup of pre-made
sweetened red bean paste and also make
sure that this is refrigerated and
chilled as well before we use it finally
three tablespoons of powdered sugar
next in a mixing bowl add your chilled
coconut milk and the powdered sugar and
whisk together the mixture until stiff
peaks form and you've got whipped cream
now this works best when everything is
super cold so feel free to put the
ingredients in the freezer for an extra
5 to 10 minutes before using next gently
fold and mix in your red bean paste
until it's fully incorporated and once
you're done transfer the mixture to a
container and freeze for a few hours or
overnight until frozen once it's frozen
I like to let mine defrost and soften up
for about 5 minutes making it easier to
serve with an ice cream scoop
now that our ice cream is done let's go
ahead and make the parfait so I'm going
to start with a little bit of red bean
paste and this is just some sweet and
red bean paste where I added a little
bit of water to it next we'll put a
little bit of angel food cake then some
freshly cut strawberries next a little
layer of whipped cream then our ice
cream I'm going to do about three scoops
of ice cream and before I put the last
scoop of ice cream in I am going to add
a little bit of coconut jelly now I have
some strawberry wafers which I will put
there and I have a little they call them
French cookies but they're really made
in Taiwan so I don't know why they call
it French cookies and finally two pink
Pocky sticks
so that's how you make a red bean ice
cream and red bean ice cream parfait
without an ice cream maker I'm angel I
hope you guys enjoyed this dessert video
don't forget to Like and subscribe to my
channel
angel Wong's kitchen for more Asian
recipes made simple and fun until then
check out Rachel's Channel quite sweet
world where she has a pink Pocky cake
that tastes amazing and it looks so
pretty so until then take care
and I will see you guys soon bye this is
my favorite part of the video the taste
test
so rich and creamy love the coconut
there's a red bean and I'm going to try
a little bit of wafer so good move glad
to try this recipe
